name: Pedagogus–LatinNounReview
description:
"Pedagogus–Latin noun review" is a Latin grammar review app which provides 500+ noun and pronoun practice questions.

Just as the ancient roman Pedagogi did, this app acts as a catalyst for education. This app provides numerous practice questions in which Latin disciples can decline nouns and pronouns.

The app contains various achievements to incentivize taking full advantage of the consistent practice Pedagogus provides.

Disclaimer:

This was intended to be an app but I ran into troubles with publishing it on to both the app store and google play. Because of this it is easy to exploit; however, if you intend to actually practice declination then I recommend playing as intended.

Credits:

Audio - Robert Moreland

Special thanks - Dr. Allison Das

Programming - Myself

Art - Myself, made in Piskel
